SEARCH
Package fr.paymybuddy.repository

Interface TransactionRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<fr.paymybuddy.model.Transaction,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<fr.paymybuddy.model.Transaction,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<fr.paymybuddy.model.Transaction,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<fr.paymybuddy.model.Transaction,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<fr.paymybuddy.model.Transaction,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<fr.paymybuddy.model.Transaction>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<fr.paymybuddy.model.Transaction,Long>
@Repository public interface TransactionRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<fr.paymybuddy.model.Transaction,Long>
Repository interface for managing Transaction entities.

This repository provides CRUD operations for Transaction objects and additional methods to retrieve transactions based on sender and receiver IDs.

  • Method Details

    • findBySender_Id

      List<fr.paymybuddy.model.Transaction> findBySender_Id(Long senderId)
      Finds all transactions sent by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      senderId - the ID of the sender user
      Returns:
      a list of transactions where the specified user is the sender

      Finds all transactions received by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      receiverId - the ID of the receiver user
      Returns:
      a list of transactions where the specified user is the receiver
